features: THE EXTREME ODOR ELIMINATOR: Don't mask nasty odors with flowery air fresheners, eliminate them with FunkAway Aerosol Spray. It's perfect for shoes, pet beds, trash cans, sports gear and anything else that stinks.
WORKS ON ALL SMELLS: FunkAway is a must-have for parents, athletes, gym rats and workers who sweat for a living. Get rid of sweat, smoke, pet, mildew, skunk and food smells for a fresh, clean home.

FOR STUFF YOU CAN'T PUT IN THE WASH: Instead of throwing out a funked-up suitcase or gym bag, breathe some new life into it with this deodorizer spray. It's a great option for keeping all your non-washables smelling fresh.

POWERFUL FORMULA: Unlike conventional room fresheners, FunkAway's exclusive OM Complex eliminates the toughest odors at the source. Just spray it on whatever stinks, let it air dry and the odor's gone. FunkAway is guaranteed to work.
LIVE A FUNK-FREE LIFE: Shop our full catalog of odor elimination products to control everything from car odors to sweat smell – all made in the USA.
body.description: Don't just cover up odors, eliminate them with FunkAway Aerosol Spray. Unlike a conventional air freshener spray that tries to cover up nasty smells with a flowery scent, FunkAway's exclusive, powerful OM Complex eliminates the toughest odors at the source. It's perfect for parents, athletes, gym rats and people who sweat for a living. Tackle those stubborn stenches on clothes, shoes, pet beds or sports gear and breathe new life into bulky non-washables like suitcases and gym bags. Just spray it on, let it air dry and the odor’s gone – guaranteed. We tried the other odor eliminators, but they just covered up the odors. We needed something that eliminated the grossest, most extreme, sickest smells you've ever smelled. The kind you find in hockey locker rooms, garbage dumps, public restrooms, or even worse, a teenager's bedroom. We locked ourselves in a lab and didn't leave until we had the solution – our exclusive OM Complex! Now we have a whole line of extreme odor eliminators, and we're always working on something new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ☆Seems to work great so far☆
reviews.reviewText: 1. Smells almosr like the "linen" fragrance commonly used. I like it, the people around me comment and say that sanitizer smells great! I use on skate insoles and safety pads.2. It comes out a heavy spray so just quickly spray my stuff, not wanting to overuse/saturate, doesnt seem to need to be sopping wet (like they suggest) to be effective (so far)3. Ingredients seemingly are Acetone and ethenol? I take my insoles out bc i dont want to damage the leather inside my skates, it might eat away at any adhesives used or nylon/synthetic threads. Just erring on the side of caution.4. I left in bag in car.It was cold.When i twist unlocked the spray nozzle it released pressure and sprayed me in the face, glad i had eyewear on!So.... beware of temperature changes and point away. Its been a bit leaky at nozzle the last use. Ill keep an "eye" on it (badda-bump!)Overall no complaints and currently all positive. Just seeing how long it will take b4 i need to wash my gear again!?Might try the other squeeze pump style next time instead of pressurized aerosol :)*Adding, just bought a bottle of the pump style :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got rid of the funky smell in my sneakers
reviews.reviewText: My sneakers had a bad smell after I stepped in a puddle with them and I couldn't get rid of the smell. I tried some disinfectant spray, baking soda and a different shoe odor spray I already owned but nothing worked so I bought this. I took off the laces, opened up the tongue, then gave the sneakers a good spray and left them open with the spray soaking in for 48hrs. At first I thought the spray had just masked the bad odor since it has a really strong "fresh" smell which I'm not the biggest fan of, however the "fresh" smell went away after a few wears and the bad smell that was previously plaguing the shoes never came back so that's a win for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Powerful Odor Elimination in a Big Package
reviews.reviewText: The FunkAway Big Jobs Aerosol Spray is a true lifesaver when it comes to eliminating extreme odors. This 13.5 oz can packs a powerful punch and effectively tackles stubborn odors that other products may struggle to eliminate.The standout feature of this spray is its extreme odor-fighting capability. Whether it's lingering sports equipment smells, pet odors, or musty odors from shoes or gym bags, the FunkAway spray eliminates them with ease. It doesn't just mask the odors; it neutralizes them at the source, leaving behind a fresh and clean scent.The large size of the can is ideal for heavy-duty odor elimination tasks. It ensures that you have plenty of product to tackle big jobs and last for an extended period. The aerosol spray allows for easy and even application, covering a wide area with each spray.One minor drawback is that the scent of the spray itself can be quite strong initially, but it dissipates quickly, leaving a clean-smelling environment.Overall, the FunkAway Big Jobs Aerosol Spray is a must-have for those dealing with extreme odors. With its powerful odor elimination capabilities and large size, it provides an effective solution for eliminating tough odors and freshening up your space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OPERATION DESTROY FUNK
reviews.reviewText: Has a nice fresh scent, not too powdery, very pleasant.Works extremely well, tested and destroys the following odors:1. Cooking odors2. Bathroom odors3.Teenage Funk4.OLD PEOPLE FUNK-This was a great victory if you have smelled it, you know it's not good!5.SmokePrice is reasonable, even more economical as you do no need so much.Overall, I would recommend this product, and I will buy more . I have also purchased the beads and have them in each room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product. It works great.
reviews.reviewText: This was a product a crime scene clean up guy uses in YouTube. I figured if it can take the funk out of crime scene it can handle the funk out of my new apartment. It was quite funky from the previous tenant and it's neighbor just general stinks, smoking and pet oders. I spray my air return, vents and each room once a week because I am too afraid to unscrew the vents beacuse they don't seem to be very secure. I ordered it August 30 after others just worked for an hour or two. This spray last a week and now as of December 2nd the smell completely gone. I am sure if I would have taken off the vents and sprayed inside of them the smell would have been gone a lot faster. I also had a friend come over and she had a pre-roll joint. It was rainy outside and I allowed her to smoke it inside. After she left it was still in the air. I sprayed the area where she sat and the fabric chair and the smell was gone. Under the bathroom sink has a must smell and I sprayed under there a couple of times a few says apart and the smell is gone. Great product worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Too powerful for me. It is great at eliminating/ masking odors but the scent is so strong and does not dissipate. I left my locker open for days and my gear still reeks of this. Better than sweat, but still overpowering.

I thought nothing would work on my son's soccer shoes. I tried a couple of other brands which did not do much. I tried many ideas on how to get rid of the smell but it's bacteria your dealing with. You do need to wash the shoes in the machine first. I took a few online tips removing the insoles, adding scent boosters and soaking it for a bit in cold water. then wash on delicate with some towels.After that follow the directions I have done it twice so far and it's pretty much gone but as with every product, you need to do for a few times.Love it and you won't be disappointed I should have gone with this as my first choice after reading many online reviews not just what is written on amazon. Hopefully, I can get my money back on the other products.
